title: [Proposal] Sushiswap TRU/ETH LP Retroactive Grant
body:
##### Original Author(s): @MG-TT & @tylerw
**Forum discussion**: https://forum.truefi.io/t/proposal-sushiswap-tru-eth-lp-retroactive-airdrop/589

### Summary
The Sushiswap TRU/ETH pool migration was promoted as an opportunity to benefit from double rewards, in SUSHI and TRU. With the delay of this feature, Sushiswap LPs did not receive the TRU awards they expected. 

This proposal asks if TrueFi should award the affected LPs retroactively.

* The time frame being considered is March 22, 2021 - May 20th, 2021
* This issue affected 33 LPs on Sushiswap during that period
* During this period, Sushiswap LPs expected to receive 10,108 TRU per day
* The total TRU/ETH Sushiswap LPs would have received is **172k TRU** (market price ~$50,000 at time of writing)
* The disbursement would be drawn from the TrueFi incentive pool

### Please vote 1 (SUPPORT) or 2 (REJECT):
1. **(SUPPORT)**, I vote to distribute 100% of the estimated rewards (172k TRU) to the 33 affected LPs
2. **(REJECT)**, I vote to NOT distribute any of the TRU rewards to the 33 affected LPs
author: 0x07fa72EFf165392E1772b99841AF5F1bdE8F9919
